item.description:
Heh! Its Midnight Rodeo Bar's Birthday......can you believe it? 1 yr sure went by fast.....anyway....BIG things go'in down at the Yard Saturday nite. Michelle Jackson is giving a 2 step class from 3-5 pm...then for a decent price there will be a BBQ (hamburgers/hot doggies) put on by the Yard Restaurant. 7:30 to 8:30 Michelle is going to give us some fun lessons and at 9 pm the fun will begin....Crisis and Bobby Carlson and Stones River....these groups are smok'in HOT......come dance.....sit and listen.....but come on out....you don't want to miss this! Am sure John Black will be taking lots of pics for the web too.....DJ Rich will be there ....all night long...see ya there.

HAPPY 1ST BIRTHDAY, MIDNIGHT RODEO BAR!!!!! and many thanks to Deb and Dave for the opportunity to meet new people/friends and such a fun place to dance....Kudos!

OH.....good grief! I almost forgot to say.....BIG welcome to our newest dance family members....Nicole Humann, Elizabeth Maina (hubby Joe too) and Valerie....hope to see ya there! Join us at the meetup table near the bar or sit with your friends.....just come....
item.name: Midnight Rodeo Bar Meetup
